results.t: What is Telnet? Definition from SearchNetworking
results.p: Telnet is a text-based network protocol that facilitates remote computer access. Learn how Telnet works, its uses, security concerns and more.

results.t: How to Use the Telnet Client in Windows
results.p: Jun 25, 2024 — Enable Telnet Client in the Programs and Features area of Control Panel, then enter 'telnet' followed by the hostname in Command Prompt.
